Trade/Device Name(s): Alere Cholestech LDX® Lipid Profile• GLU Cassette
Regulatory Class: Class II, Class I (exempt for Analyzer and some lipids)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Alere Cholestech LDX Lipid Profile• GLU Cassette and Analyzer for quantitative determination of lipid panel and glucose in whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative determination of total cholesterol, HDL cholesterol, triglycerides, and glucose in whole blood; calculated values for LDL cholesterol, non-HDL cholesterol, and TC/HDL ratio; used in the diagnosis and treatment of lipid and carbohydrate metabolism disorders including diabetes mellitus, atherosclerosis, and liver and renal diseases.
